With a roll of 18 on your D20, Lirael takes aim at Cultist 2 (the severely wounded spellcaster) once more, hoping to finish them off. Her arrow strikes true, dealing an additional 2 points of damage. The spellcaster, unable to maintain concentration on the ritual any longer, falls to the ground, defeated.

Current combat situation:

* Cultist 1 (disrupted spellcaster): Defeated
* Cultist 2 (spellcaster): Defeated
* Cultist 3 (melee): Engaged with Dragonborn warriors, severely wounded and restrained
* Cultist 4 (melee): Engaged with Dragonborn warriors, severely wounded
* Cultist 5 (melee): Defeated

Allies:

* Lirael: Unharmed
* Dragonborn warriors: Slightly wounded
* Esterosian mage: Unharmed
* Esterosian fighters: Slightly wounded

What will you do next, Lirael?

A. Aid the Dragonborn warriors, focusing on the severely wounded melee cultist who is still free. (Roll a D20 for the attack and a D8 for damage, if successful.)
B. Coordinate another focused attack with the Esterosian fighters, targeting the remaining severely wounded melee cultist. (Roll a D20 for the attack and a D8 for damage, if successful, with a bonus from the fighters' assistance.)
C. Attempt to interrogate the captured cultist, hoping to force them to reveal information about their plans. (Roll an Intimidation check using a D20, adding your Charisma modifier.)
D. Keep an eye out for any additional threats that may be lurking nearby. (Roll a Perception check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
E. Assess the overall state of your allies, ensuring their well-being. (Roll a Medicine check using a D20, adding your Wisdom modifier.)
